definitions: The thick white or pale yellow fatty liquid which rises to the top when milk is left to stand and which can be eaten as an accompaniment to desserts or used as a cooking ingredient.
The part of a liquid that gathers at the top.
A sauce, soup, dessert, or other dish containing cream or having a creamy consistency.
A sweet of a specified flavour which is creamy in texture.
A biscuit with a creamy filling.
A thick liquid or semi-solid cosmetic or medical preparation applied to the skin.
The very best of a group of people or things.
A very pale yellow or off-white colour.
